member_organisations: Peru Support Group – Great Britain; Entraide et Fraternité –  Belgium; Commission Justice & Paix Belgique Francophone – Belgium; Asociación Pro Derechos Humanos de España – Spain; Centro de Investigación y Documentación Chile-América Latina – Germany; Secours Catholique –  France;  Informationsstelle Peru – Germany; CATAPA – Belgium; Broederlijk Delen – Belgium; Kampagne “Bergwerk Peru – Reichtum geht, Armut bleibt“  – Germany; Coalition of the Flemish North-South Movement, 11.11.11 – Belgium; PLataforma Q’atary Peru – Spain; Peru Kommittén för MR – Sweden; Entrepueblos – Spain; FOS – Belgium;  Asociación Putumayo – Belgium.. Amnesty International (Belgium) is associated to the PEP as observer.
fields_of_interest: Trade, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights
eu_initiatives:
Free Trade Agreement between UE and Peru/Colombia/Ecuador. We are member of the DAG and we have presented in october 2017 a complaint for breach to the section 9 of the Trade Agreement by Peru. 
Human rights policies with the partner countries.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Complaint for breach to the section 9 of the Trade Agreement by Peru available on http://www.europaperu.org/
goals__remit: The Platform Europe Peru (Plataforma Europa Perú – PEP) is a network of 16 European NGOs that was created in 2005 with the aim to increase coordination of advocacy toward European institutions and the European public on the topic of human rights situation in Peru.
